SELECT ifnull(count(T.design_work_seq),0) as "cntL" FROM t_design_work_like T WHERE T.design_work_seq In ( select seq From v_design_work WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq} )

SELECT ifnull(count(T.seq),0) as "cntD" FROM v_design_work T Where member_seq = #{memberSeq}

SELECT U.category_name as "categoryName", U.category_code as "categoryCode" FROM t_member_category T JOIN t_category U ON T.category_code = U.category_code WHERE T.member_seq = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY U.category_name
SELECT project_name as "pjname", seq as "wseq" FROM v_project WHERE owner_seq = #{memberSeq} OR seq IN ( SELECT project_seq FROM t_project_member WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq} ) ORDER BY seq Desc

SELECT T.group_name ,T.seq ,T.member_seq ,T.register_time ,T.update_time FROM t_pgroup T WHERE T.seq IN ( SELECT A.project_group_seq FROM t_pgroup_project A JOIN v_project B ON A.project_seq = B.seq WHERE B.owner_seq = #{schMemberSeq} ) ORDER BY T.seq
SELECT T.seq as "wseq", T.member_seq as "member_seq" FROM v_design_work T WHERE T.member_seq = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY T.seq Desc

SELECT T.seq as "wseq", T.title as "wtitle", T.thumb_uri as "thumbUri", T.contents as "wcontests", T.register_time as "wregistertime", T.tags as "wtags", W.category_name AS wcate, T.view_cnt as "wvcount", U.uname as "uname" FROM v_design_work T Join t_member U ON T.member_seq = U.seq JOIN t_design_work_category V ON T.seq = V.design_work_seq JOIN t_category W ON V.category_code = W.category_code WHERE T.member_seq = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY T.seq Desc
SELECT COUNT(*) as "cntLike" FROM t_design_work_like T WHERE T.design_work_seq = #{Wseq}

SELECT T.seq as "wseq", T.title as "wtitle", T.thumb_uri as "thumbUri", T.contents as "wcontests", T.register_time as "wregistertime", T.tags as "wtags", W.category_name AS wcate, T.view_cnt as "wvcount", U.uname as "uname" FROM v_design_work T JOIN t_member U ON T.member_seq = U.seq JOIN t_design_work_category V ON T.seq = V.design_work_seq JOIN t_category W ON V.category_code = W.category_code WHERE T.seq IN ( SELECT design_work_seq FROM t_design_work_like Where member_seq = #{memberSeq} ) ORDER BY T.seq Desc

SELECT T.seq as "wseq", T.title as "wtitle", T.thumb_uri as "thumbUri", C.register_time as "wregistertime", T.member_seq as memberSeq, U.seq as useq, U.uname as "uname", C.point as "oPoint" FROM v_design_work T Join t_member U ON T.member_seq = U.seq Join t_order C ON T.seq = C.design_work_seq WHERE C.member_seq = #{memberSeq} ORDER BY C.register_time Desc

SELECT T.sign, CASE WHEN T.sign = 'C' Then '구매' WHEN T.sign = 'S' Then '판매' END as "wsign", T.amount as "wamount", T.accum_amount as "waccumamount", T.register_time as "wregistertime", T.comments as "wcomments" FROM t_point_history T WHERE T.member_seq = #{memberSeq} And T.register_time >= #{fromDate} And T.register_time <= #{toDate} ORDER BY T.seq Desc
